name: SpeedCast Connect
overview:
SpeedCast Connect provides high-quality bulk cable, digital TV from Dish Network, broadband Internet and digital phone services to multi-dwelling units throughout California. We specialize in senior housing such as assisted living, retirement homes and nursing home communities.

The personal service, support and ongoing maintenance we provide to our customers are the cornerstone of our success. We offer the most responsive technical support in the bulk cable industry along with reliable, cutting-edge equipment and installation – whether you have 50 units or 350.

Our long term track record at reliable performance and personal service distinguishes us in the bulk cable industry. By choosing SpeedCast Connect as your wholesale service provider, you can be confident we’ll continually work to exceed your expectations.
